ROM.Changelog:
##### Android 8.0.1 - Miix4 Build 18.5.5
* MxUI version 4.3.1 * Changes to MxPlatform API > MxUI * Performance tweaks and improvements * Added ‘Assist button’ feature for users with Google Go installed
**Updates to the following applications:**
* MxUI_Core - 20180424 * MxDevice - 18.5.19 * SamsungIME - v6_2018A_SWIFTKEY_MX4 * ThemeTrampoline - 20180425 * SystemUI - 2018A_MX4.3-1
**Note for 15.5.5:** If you have a different icon theme applied, you may need to re-apply it after this update.
**If you download updates over a data connection or while roaming, additional data charges may apply. It is advised to keep your device fully charged during the update.**
